attributes.additional_details:
David Freud must resign as his latest comments regarding people with disabilities working for £2.00 an hour clearly breaches the Equality Act 2010, This is shocking behaviour from a Lord and I am afraid an apology is not good enough as he should have known or been trained in the Equality Act 2010,

I call on David Cameron Prime Minister to call for his Immediate resignation as he can no longer be trusted to create better opportunities for people with disabilities in his role of Minister for Welfare Reform.  .
